bboxes.raw_text:
Mike Battle Chapman celebrated his fifth birthday with
a of friends. .


Mike can hardly his cake He fanked by David
Holman and Calvin Holman.


Others attending Battles birthday party included Donna
Tanner Rodney jon, Janet and Lawrence Holman Cnery
porr and Nina Groves photo-B. Heard

To peel tomatoes quicker and
easier try any one of these three
methods suggested by food
specialists of the Department
of Agriculture.


|, Stroke the skin with the dull
edge of a knife blade until the
skin is loosened, or


2. Dip the tomato in boiling
water for l minute, then cool at
once in cold water, or


8. Run fork into tomato and rotate
it over heat of cooking unit until
the skin is tight and shiny. Cool
at once in cold water.


The peel will come off easily
after any one of these treatments.

ALBANY The NAACP has
filed a petition with the state
Commissioner Of Education pro-
testing the attempts Of the Buffalo
Board Of Education to continue to
maintain and increase school
segregation in its school system
and also protesting its discrim-
inatory practices in hiring and
placing Of Negro teachers.


The NAACP has made several
unsuccessful attempts to get the
Buffalo Board of Education to
eradicate de facto segregation
in the city. Sixteen of Buffalo's
80 elementary schools are over
70 percent Negro.


approximately 90 percent of
the Negro elementary school
children are attending segregated
schools. A new junior high
school, scheduled to open this
fall, has been zoned SO that its
enrolment will be almost en-
tirely Negro.


In addition, it is estimated that
there are less than 800 Negro
teachers in the entire system Of
5000 teachers. Only two adj
ministrative positins are held
by Negroes out of a total of 266.

full articles.article:
To peel tomatoes quicker and

|, Stroke the skin with the dull

skin is loosened, or


2. Dip the tomato in boiling
water for l minute, then cool at
once in cold water, or


8. Run fork into tomato and rotate
it over heat of cooking unit until
the skin is tight and shiny. Cool
at once in cold water.


The peel will come off easily
after any one of these treatments.

full articles.headline:
Segregation Tests
in Buffalo
